name: .ABEX
summary: Learn about .ABEX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can use Droid Explorer (Windows) to restore an ABEX backup to the Android device that created the file. To do so:
Connect the Android device from which your ABEX file was created to your computer.
Right-click your ABEX file and select Restore Backup to Device.
Droid Explorer will then walk you through how to use your ABEX file to restore the backup it contains.
You can also use Camalot's modified version of Android Backup Extractor (cross-platform) to extract the files an ABEX file contains.
